title: NutriBullet University: Helping Students Reduce Their Cholesterol
description: By helping kids reduce their cholesterol, the NBU program has also helped kids decrease their chance of heart disease.

asset.title: NutriBullet University: Helping Students Reduce Their Cholesterol
asset.description:
By helping kids reduce their cholesterol, the NBU program has also helped kids decrease their chance of heart disease. 



For more information, please visit: http://www.nutribulletuniversity.com.

Follow NutriBullet University:

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/NutriBulletUn...
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/BeTheNextUNI
Instagram: @NutriBulletUniversity
asset.author: NutriBullet

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Our kids saw a decrease in their total cholesterol by 23% and they improved their HDL, you know, the good cholesterol that helps remove unhealthy fat and keeps our arteries clean by a whopping 59%. That means by simply increasing their intake of vegetables and fruits on a daily basis they actually decrease their overall risk of heart disease
